0x6CCD2564.name: GET_CONVAR

params.name: varName
params.description: The console variable to look up.

params.name: default_
params.description: The default value to set if none is found.

0x6CCD2564.description: Can be used to get a console variable of type `char*`, for example a string.

examples.code:
if GetConvar('voice_useNativeAudio', 'false') == 'true' then
    Citizen.Trace('Native Audio is enabled.')
end

0x6CCD2564.resultsDescription: Returns the convar value if it can be found, otherwise it returns the assigned `default`.
